text: Nangni'n kei ningnaleijet inchu, nangni'n kei Kapa kha-um ningleijetsik14:7. Nangni'n kei ningnaleijet inchu ningleijetsik kha eii; manuscript lekkhat ah hin tia injia nangni'n kei ningnaleijetjei inchu ... nangni'n jetningte. kha eii; tuun makheiya chu nangni'n ama kha ningjetjei khat-um ningmujei.”
